languages.text: "Полагаю, вы прослушали мое послание в святилище исповедей". {n}Вигдис отвечает без тени смущения.{/n} "Хотите поговорить об этом?"
"I assume you heard my confessional message," {n}Vigdis replies, without a hint of awkwardness.{/n} "Do you wish to talk about it?"
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, вы прослушали мое послание в святилище исповедей". {n}Вигдис отвечает без тени смущения.{/n} "Хотите поговорить об этом?"

traits.locale_text: "I assume you heard my confessional message," {n}Vigdis replies, without a hint of awkwardness.{/n} "Do you wish to talk about it?"
"I understand you heard my confession machine message," {n}Vigdis replies, without a hint of awkwardness.{/n} "Would you like to talk about it?"

"I assume you heard my confessional message," {n}Vigdis replies, without a hint of awkwardness.{/n} "Do you wish to talk about it?"

languages.text: « J'imagine que vous avez entendu mon message du confessionnal, {n}répond Vigdis sans la moindre gêne.{/n} Souhaitez-vous en parler ? »
languages.original_text: "I assume you heard my confessional message," {n}Vigdis replies, without a hint of awkwardness.{/n} "Do you wish to talk about it?"

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine que vous avez entendu ma confession, {n}répond Vigdis sans la moindre gêne.{/n} Souhaitez-vous en parler ? »

languages.text: «Doy por hecho que ha escuchado mi confesión». {n}Vigdis responde sin rastro de incomodidad.{/n} «¿Quiere hablar de ello?».
languages.original_text: "I assume you heard my confessional message," {n}Vigdis replies, without a hint of awkwardness.{/n} "Do you wish to talk about it?"

traits.locale_text: «Doy por hecho que ha escuchado mi mensaje en la máquina confesora». {n}Vigdis responde sin rastro de incomodidad.{/n} «¿Quiere hablar de ello?».

languages.text: “我猜测，您应该是听到了我的告解留言。”{n}维格迪斯回答道，声音中没有一丝犹豫。{/n}“您想谈谈这件事情吗？”
languages.original_text: "I assume you heard my confessional message," {n}Vigdis replies, without a hint of awkwardness.{/n} "Do you wish to talk about it?"

traits.locale_text: “我猜测，您应该是听到了我的告解留言录音。”{n}维格迪斯回答道，声音中没有一丝犹豫。{/n}“您想谈谈这件事情吗？”

languages.text: 「私の告白を聞かれたのでしょう」{n}ヴィグディスは一切気まずさを感じさせず、答えた。{/n}「その件について話したいことがあるのですか？」
languages.original_text: "I assume you heard my confessional message," {n}Vigdis replies, without a hint of awkwardness.{/n} "Do you wish to talk about it?"

traits.locale_text: 「私の告白を聞かれたのでしょう」{n}ヴィグディスは一切気まずさを感じさせず、答えた。{/n}「その件について話したいことがあるのですか？」

languages.text: "Ich nehme an, Ihr habt mein Bekenntnis gehört"{n}, antwortet Vigdis ohne eine Spur von Scham.{/n} "Wollt Ihr darüber reden?"
languages.original_text: "I assume you heard my confessional message," {n}Vigdis replies, without a hint of awkwardness.{/n} "Do you wish to talk about it?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt wohl meine Nachricht in der Beichtmaschine gehört"{n}, antwortet Vigdis ohne eine Spur von Scham.{/n} "Möchtet Ihr darüber sprechen?"

languages.text: "Günah çıkarma mesajımı duyduğunuzu varsayıyorum." {n}Vigdis, en ufak bir tuhaflık emaresi olmaksızın yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Üzerine konuşmak ister misiniz?"
languages.original_text: "I assume you heard my confessional message," {n}Vigdis replies, without a hint of awkwardness.{/n} "Do you wish to talk about it?"
